title: 79/75/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1978 approving the plan for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis put forward by Belgium (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 21 December 1978  approving the plan for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis put forward by Belgium  (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)  (79/75/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis put forward by Belgium is hereby approved.
Belgium shall put into effect by 12 December 1978 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to implement the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 44. (2)OJ No L 15, 19.1.1978, p. 34.
